Title: The Samuel Project
Writer: Marc Fusco (story), Marc Fusco, Chris Neighbors (story), Chris Neighbors, Steve Weinberger (story)
Actors: Liza Lapira, Hal Linden, Michael B. Silver, Mateo Arias
Plot: Eli, an outcast teen, connects with his isolated grandfather Samuel for the first time, and uncovers his surprising past, when he makes his grandpa the subject of an animated art project for school.
